name: GROUP_FACILITATORS
description: A table describing the facilitators for a group.

columns.name: PAT_GROUP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the group record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: GROUP_FACILITATORS_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.
